pages.text: Mob Spawners can have their entity changed by using a $(9)Spawn Egg$().$(p)Typically, these are unobtainable. To remedy this, Apotheosis adds the $(9)Capturing$() enchantment for swords.

pages.title: Spawn Eggs
pages.text: Each level of the $(9)Capturing$() enchantment gives you an 0.4% chance for entities to drop their spawn egg on death.$(p)Entities without a spawn egg item (as seen in JEI) cannot drop one.
